name: Hunting Deer Forest Race: The gun hunt for the big antler - Free Edition
name_original: Hunting Deer Forest Race: The gun hunt for the big antler - Free Edition
description:
TRY OUR HUNTING DEER FOREST RACE : THE GUN HUNT FOR THE BIG ANTLER GAME

In this shooting game, you will hunt for deer in the forest. You have to sharp when you take gun shots but avoid obstacles and traps in the forest.
Try to collect as much gold coins and deer antlers to unlock new hunting characters.

Features:
- Cool soundtrack
- Awesome theme and concept
- Amazing graphics and effects
- Most addictive and fun game ever

How to play?
- Hunt for deer and you can use gun to shoot them
- Avoid obstacles and traps
- Collect coins and antlers to unlock all 6 best hunters

DOWNLOAD TODAY FOR FREE >>> HUNTING DEER FOREST RACE : THE GUN HUNT FOR THE BIG ANTLER GAME
